data.title: Timothy Dalton Net Worth in 2024: Quick Facts and Financial Overview
data.meta_description: Discover Timothy Dalton's net worth in 2024, key facts, and financial insights. Written by RachelParris for rachelparris.com.
data.text:
Timothy Dalton net worth and career achievements are captivating topics for many fans. In this article, we’ll explore his financial journey and current wealth.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NameTimothy Leonard Dalton LeggettPopular NameTimothy DaltonGenderMaleBirth Date21 March 1946Age78ParentsPeter Dalton Leggett, Dorothy ScholesSiblingsMark Dalton, Annabelle Dalton, Stephen Dalton, Suzzane DaltonBirthplaceColwyn Bay, WalesNationalityBritishEthnicityMixed (Irish, Italian)EducationRoyal Academy of Dramatic ArtMarital StatusN/ASexual OrientationN/AWife/SpouseN/AChildrenAlexander DaltonDatingN/ANet Worth$20 millionSource of WealthActingHeight6 ft 2 in (1.87 m)

What is the Net Worth Of Timothy Dalton in 2024?

Timothy Dalton‘s net worth in 2024 is estimated to be around $20 million. His wealth is notable among his peers. Comparing his net worth with other related personalities provides a broader context:

Timothy Dalton Finance Overview

Early Life and Career Beginnings

Timothy Dalton was born on 21 March 1946 in Colwyn Bay, Wales. His early education at Herbert Strutt Grammar School and later at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art laid the foundation for his acting career. Influenced by a production of Macbeth, he pursued acting passionately.

This decision pleased his father, though his mother’s side was concerned about the profession’s stability.

Rise to Fame: Key Roles and Breakthroughs

Dalton’s film debut in The Lion in Winter set the stage for his successful career. He starred in notable period dramas such as Wuthering Heights, Cromwell, and Mary, Queen of Scots.

His transition to Hollywood was marked by significant roles, which elevated his status in the industry.

James Bond Era

Dalton was first approached for the role of James Bond in the late 1960s but declined due to feeling too young.

His portrayal of Bond in The Living Daylights and Licence to Kill was critically acclaimed, with a focus on a darker, more serious character, aligning closely with Ian Fleming’s original novels.

Post-Bond Film Career

After his Bond films, Dalton continued to shine in the 1990s with roles in The Rocketeer, Scarlett, and more.

His performances in the 2000s, including Hot Fuzz and The Tourist, showcased his versatility. Recent projects have kept him relevant in the industry.

Television and Voice Acting Contributions

Dalton’s television career includes early roles with the BBC and significant appearances in series like Jane Eyre, Doctor Who, Penny Dreadful, and Doom Patrol.

His voice acting includes memorable roles in Toy Story 3 and Toy Story 4.

Theater Involvement and Achievements

His theater career is marked by performances with the Royal Shakespeare Company and other troupes.

Significant stage roles include Romeo and Juliet, Antony and Cleopatra, and His Dark Materials.

Personal Life and Relationships

Timothy Dalton had a long-term relationship with Vanessa Redgrave and brief relationships with Stefanie Powers and Whoopi Goldberg.

He has a son, Alexander Dalton, with musician Oksana Grigorieva. Dalton resides in London, West Hollywood, and Antigua and Barbuda.

Social media

N/A

FAQs about Timothy Dalton

Who is Timothy Dalton?

Timothy Dalton is a renowned British actor known for his roles in film, television, and theater. He is most famous for his portrayal of James Bond.

What are Dalton’s most famous roles?

Dalton is best known for playing James Bond in The Living Daylights (1987) and Licence to Kill (1989). He also starred as Rochester in Jane Eyre (1983) and Rhett Butler in Scarlett (1994).

When was Dalton born?

Dalton was born on March 21, 1946, in Colwyn Bay, Wales.

What distinguishes Timothy Dalton’s portrayal of James Bond?

Dalton’s Bond is known for being more serious and realistic compared to his predecessors, bringing a darker, more intense interpretation of the character.

Has Dalton received any awards?

Yes, Dalton has received several awards and nominations throughout his career, including a TV Land Award for his role in Jane Eyre.

What other notable TV roles has Timothy Dalton played?

Dalton has appeared in several notable TV series, such as Penny Dreadful where he played Sir Malcolm Murray, and Doom Patrol as The Chief.

How did Dalton start his acting career?

Dalton began his acting career in theater, performing with the Royal Shakespeare Company before transitioning to film and television.

Why did Timothy Dalton leave the James Bond role?

Dalton left the Bond role due to legal issues surrounding the franchise and his desire to pursue other acting opportunities.

What are some of Dalton’s recent works?

Recently, Dalton has been involved in series like Doom Patrol and has lent his voice to animated projects such as Toy Story 3.

Conclusion
